title: Sara
subtitle: Meet Joys and Rhydell from the Butetown-based advocacy group Women Seeking Sanctuary! They help refugee women in so many ways, such as educational courses and training, free food Fridays and advice services! Go and have a look at their page https://wssagwales.wordpress.com pic.twitter.com/aWBjheuJQy

title: Shaykha Safia Shahid
subtitle:
More than halfway now, over £2000 alhamdulillah! Be part of this blessed initiative and donate now to provide urgent aid to the Syrian refugees: http://empower.iacharity.org/safiashahid  

May Allah bless your wealth and grant you more.

title: Sasha Simic
subtitle: In 1977 #Corbyn helped stop the Nazis in Tottenham.  In the 80s he was fighting apartheid. In 2015 his first act as @UKLabour was marching in solidarity with immigrants and refugees as the #Tories were building their #HostileEnvironment. You know where you can go with your lies.pic.twitter.com/X59bFB7M0H

title: Eben Adu
subtitle: It’s observed that almost one in every 35 people in the world is a migrant- this includes migrant workers, international students, and refugees. The global immigrant community is around 214 million with a projection of 450 million by 2050-let’s meet at http://www.lcm.org/commonground .pic.twitter.com/LoBSm3yeoc

title: Mobile School
subtitle: WE WANT YOU!  We are looking for an enthusiastic volunteer translator who is able to translate from English or French to Arabic for a new Mobile School project in Turkey that is mainly working with refugees from Syria and Iraq  pic.twitter.com/BMQedQA3uJ
